exchange-config.caption: 九天排产计划(商业化的时间)

reader.sql: select usercenter,whof,CODECEN,uw5anoseq,monveh,EFERPORTE,LMP,PORTEDATE,AZPOSVEH,STATE,sysdate as cjdate from CKXZBC_TEST.zcgdxx
select whof,flag,'0' as clzt,sysdate as cj_date from in_syof

select codecen, (select LMP from TB_WLDID y where y.wldid=wldid) as lmp, whof, substr((select shangxd from ckx_peislb z where z.peislx = (select t.peislx from ckx_tongbjplj t where t.usercenter = trim(codecen) and t.lingjbh = trim(PRODUCT) and t.shengcxbh = trim(LMP) and t.nclass = trim(OCLASS))),1,9) as xiaohdbh, uw5anoseq, oclass, bzz, product, (select danw from ckx_lingj w where w.usercenter=codecen and w.lingjbh=product) as danw, sxdate, coef_att, jsbs, csdate, '0' as clzt, sysdate as cj_date from CKXZBC_TEST.in_gdtbxq

select usercenter,ljh,ljdhcj,to_date(ksrq,'yyyy-MM-dd') as ksrq,to_date(jsrq,'yyyy-MM-dd') as jsrq,zzcjdz,dw, zwmc,fymc,'2' as biaos,'interface' as creator,sysdate as create_time,WENJMC,WENJLJ from in_component
select c_user_center,c_supplier_code,'2' as leix,c_company_name,c_line_address1,c_phone,c_tax,'1' as biaos, 'interface' as creator,sysdate as create_time,WENJMC,WENJLJ from in_supplier
select c_user_center,c_component_code,c_supplier_code,c_ebeln,n_quote, to_date(t_begin,'yyyy-MM-dd') as t_begin,'interface' as creator,sysdate as create_time,WENJMC,WENJLJ from in_component_supplier
select xhd,xhdzt,'1' as biaos,'interface' as creator,sysdate as create_time,WENJMC,WENJLJ from in_xhdckx

select case when czm='D' then '0' else '1' end as czm, usercenter, lingj, xhd, substr(xhd, 1, 5) as fenpqbh, '0' as xiaohbl, '2' as biaos, (select y.shengcxbh from ckx_fenpq y where y.usercenter = t.usercenter and y.fenpqh = substr(t.xhd, 1, 5)) as shengcxbh,'interface' as creator, sysdate as create_time, WENJMC, WENJLJ from in_xhdljckx t
select usercenter,CODDC,lingj,xiaohd,xhdxs,EMON,'interface' as creator,sysdate as cjsj from in_coddc

exchange-config.caption: EDI发货通知-发运主体信息

reader.sql: select usercenter,T01A001,T01B001,D03B001,D03D002,D03FA01,D03FA02,D03FA05,D03FD03,C18AB01, C18B005,C05AB01,H02AB01,C06AB01,D04A001,shiftb,shifxl,state,sysdate as cj_date,'0' as clzt from in_edi_fhtz_fyxx
select xuh,T01A001,A02D001,A02D002,B03AB01,B03AB02,A04A002,A04B003,A09AC01,A01C009 from in_edi_fhtz_fymx

exchange-config.caption: EDI发货通知-包装对应信息

reader.sql: select xuh,T01A001,B04A001,B05AB01,B05AB03,ucbzlx,uaucgs,ucrl,B05AB02,B05AD01,A07A001 from in_edi_fhtz_bzxx

exchange-config.caption: EFI发货通知-发运主体信息

reader.sql: select jfdh,jf_date,fyzmzdw,fyyjdd_date,cysdm,jszdm,xzddm,fhrdm,jzxh,sftbfhtz,sfgzxlh,sysdate as cj_date,'0' as clzt from in_efi_fhtz_fyztxx
select xuh,jfdh,fysl,jldw,bzlx,ljh,ddh,lygj from in_efi_fhtz_fymx

exchange-config.caption: EFI发货通知-包装对应信息

reader.sql: select xuh,jfdh,ua,ualx,uc,uclx,ucljsl,ualjsl,yhl,pzh,gys from in_efi_fhtz_bzdyxx

exchange-config.caption: EFI发货通知-同步零件信息

reader.sql: select ua,uc,xlh,gys,lsh,shul from in_efi_fhtz_tbljxx
select dingdh,'PY' as DINGDLX,gysdm,leix,'OEDIPP' as DINGDWHR from in_ddxx
select t_order_id_seq.nextval as id,usercenter,dingdh,lingjbh,gysdm,leix,yhqs_date,yhjs_date,xiehztbh,ckdm,dhcj,shul,danw,uabzlx,ucbzlx,ucrl,uaucgs,jf_date,zhwhr,zhwhsj,lujbh from in_ddxx
select usercenter,dbsqdh,dbsq_date,kjkm,cbzx,sysdate as cjsj from in_dbsqdxx
select xuh,usercenter,dbsqdh,zzlx,ljh,sbsl,sysdate as cjsj from in_dbsqdxx

exchange-config.caption: 九天排产计划(商业化的时间)

reader.sql: select usercenter, whof, lcdv24, yjjhzrq, yjjhzsx, (select z.chejbhhz from ckx_chexpt z,ddbh_shangyhsjjh x where z.usercenter=x.usercenter and z.chejbhzz=x.ZONGZCJDM and z.shengcxbhzz=x.YUJZZSCX) chejbhhz, (select z.shengcptbh from ckx_chexpt z,ddbh_shangyhsjjh x where z.usercenter=x.usercenter and z.chejbhzz=x.ZONGZCJDM and z.shengcxbhzz=x.YUJZZSCX) shengcptbh, (select z.shengcxbhhz from ckx_chexpt z,ddbh_shangyhsjjh x where z.usercenter=x.usercenter and z.chejbhzz=x.ZONGZCJDM and z.shengcxbhzz=x.YUJZZSCX) shengcxbhhz, scxh, yjsyhsj, sxsxh, (select CODDC from in_cldv_coddc y where y.LCDV1424 = t.lcdv) coddc, sysdate as shij, wenjlj, wenjmc from in_clddxx t
select usercenter,zzx,ofh,jtxx,jtrq,lcdv24,(select CODDC from in_cldv_coddc y where y.LCDV1424=t.lcdv3500) CODDC,sysdate as cjsj from in_jtpcjh t
select zzzx,lingjbh,yxbh,ddrq,filler,shul,zfbj,hgbm,xianh,lyxt,usercenter,'0' as clzt,sysdate as cj_date from in_wbddyg
select USERCENTER,YAOHLH,GYSDM,JIAOFJ,ZUIZSJ,ZUIWSJ,LINGJBH,DANW,YAOHSL,BAOZXH,UARL,UCXH,UCRL,UCGS,XIEHD,MUDD,DINGDH,KEHU,sysdate as cj_date,'0' as clzt from IN_GEVP_YAOHL
select zzzx, lingjbh, yxbh, ddrq, '' as filler, replace(to_char(shul, '9999999'),' ','0') as shul, zfbj, hgbm, xianh, lyxt, usercenter from ${dbSchemal2}in_zcpc

SELECT 'FLUX'||to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddHh24mi') as flux, USERCENTER, LINGJBH, GONGYSDM, '+' || replace(replace(to_char(sum(LINGJSL), '99999.999'), '.', ''),' ','0') as LINGJSL, '+000000000' as n, DANW, CANGKBH || ZICKBH || '4' as ZCK from ${dbSchemal4}CK_USBQ where edit_time between (select end_time from ${dbSchemal4}in_time where in_id='OUT_2') and sysdate group by USERCENTER, LINGJBH, GONGYSDM, DANW, CANGKBH, ZICKBH

select 'EMBALC' || baozlx as baozlx, baozmc, lpad(changd, 4, '0') as changd, lpad(kuand, 4, '0') as kuand, lpad(gaod, 4, '0') as gaod, rpad(substr(changd * kuand * gaod,-6),10,'0') as tiji from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_baoz

select 'IMA' as ima, t.cangkbh || t.zickbh as tckbh, substr(t.chanx, 1, 3) as tchanx, t.lingjbh as lingjbh, y.cangkbh || y.zickbh as yckbh, (select distinct replace(replace(to_char(sum(beihsl), '99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') from ${dbSchemal4}ck_beihdmx where biaos != '2') as beihsl, (select distinct replace(replace(to_char(sum(keyljsl), '9999999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') from ${dbSchemal4}ck_usbq where BAOZZT = '4' or BAOZZT = '6') as keyljsl, (select distinct replace(replace(to_char(sum(lingjsl - keyljsl),'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') from ${dbSchemal4}ck_usbq where BAOZZT != '4' and BAOZZT != '6') as bksykc, '' as filler, t.danw as danw from ${dbSchemal4}ck_usbq t, ${dbSchemal4}ck_beihdmx y where t.ush = y.ush and t.cangklx = '3' and t.edit_time between (select end_time from ${dbSchemal4}in_time where in_id='OUT_1') and sysdate group by t.cangkbh, t.zickbh, t.chanx, t.lingjbh, y.cangkbh, y.zickbh, t.danw

select 'AVX' as avx, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddHHmm') as jlhrq, cangkbh || zickbh as fcck, keh, substr(chanx, 1, 3) as chanx, lingjbh, danw, '+'||replace(replace(to_char(shifsl, '99999,999'), '.', ''),' ','0') as shifsl, bqh, '' as filler, dingdh, replace(replace(to_char((shifsl*lingjzl), '9999,999'), ',', ''),' ','0') as mz, kehljh, 'N+' as n, replace(replace(to_char(lingjzl,'99.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as lingjzl from ${dbSchemal3}in_cpk_lszbhd

select t.usercenter as usercenter, NVL(replace(t.riq,'-',''),'') as riq, NVL(t.xingq,'') as xingq, NVL(t.shifgzr,'') as shifgzr, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMM') as gzyf, NVL(substr(t.nianzx, -2),'') as nianzx, NVL(t.nianzq || t.zhoux,'') as gyzqzs, '10' as gyxs, NVL(y.appobj,'') as appobj from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version t, ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_group y where t.usercenter=y.usercenter and t.banc=y.rilbc

select usercenter, lingjbh, gongysbh, gongyfe, '' as filer, uabzlx, replace(replace(to_char(uaucgs,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as uaucgs, ucbzlx, replace(replace(to_char(ucrl,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as ucrl from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjgys
select usercenter,gcbh,substr(gongsmc,1,35) as gongsmc,'' as filler,substr(diz,1,65) as diz from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_gongys
select '' as filler,usercenter,lingjbh,danw,jihy,biaos,zhongwmc,fawmc from ckx_lingj

select to_char(t.Dingdsxsj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as Dingdsxsj, y.usercenter as usercenter, y.lingjbh as lingjbh, y.gongysdm as gongysdm, replace(replace(to_char(y.shul,'999999999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as shul, to_char(y.yaohqsrq,'yyyyMMdd') as yaohqsrq, to_char(y.yaohjsrq,'yyyyMMdd') as yaohjsrq, y.leix as leix, replace(replace(to_char(y.uabzucsl * y.uabzucrl,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as uasl, y.uabzucsl as uabzucsl, replace(replace(to_char(y.uabzucrl,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as uabzucrl, y.uabzuclx as uabzuclx, y.uabzlx as uabzl, y.cangkdm as cangkdm, t.dingdh as dingdh, substr(t.chullx, -1) as chullx, to_char(y.jiaofrq,'yyyyMMdd') as jiaofrq， '' as filer from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingd t, ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdmx y where t.dingdh = y.dingdh and substr(t.chullx, 1, 1) = 'p' and t.dingdzt = '4' and t.Dingdfssj =to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')
select YAOHLH, '+' ||replace(replace(to_char(yanssl, '99999999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as YANSSL, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as RUKSJ from ${dbSchemal3}in_rkfk

select t.yaohlh as yaohlh, t.usercenter as usercenter, to_char(t.jiaofj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as jiaofj, to_char(t.zuizsj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as zuizsj, to_char(t.zuiwsj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as zuiwsj, t.lingjbh as tlingjbh, t.danw as tdanw, replace(replace(to_char(t.yaohsl,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as yaohsl, t.baozxh as baozxh, replace(replace(to_char(t.usxh,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as usxh, t.ucxh as ucxh, replace(replace(to_char(t.ucrl,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as ucrl, t.ucgs as ucgs, to_char(t.faysj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as faysj, t.xiehd as xiehd, t.mudd as mudd, t.dingdh as dingdh, t.yaohllx as yaohllx, t.tongblshqj as tongblshqj, t.chej as chej, t.shnagxfs as shnagxfs, t.chanx as chanx, t.keh as keh, t.peislb as peislb, to_char(t.yaohlscsj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as yaohlscsj, y.lingjxh as lingjxh, y.zhengclsh as zhengclsh, to_char(y.zhengcsxsj,'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as zhengcsxsj, y.weiz as weiz, y.lingjbh as ylingjbh, y.gongysdm as gongysdm, y.gongysmc as gongysmc, replace(replace(to_char(y.lingjsl,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as lingjsl, y.danw as ydanw, z.wuldbh as wuldbh, z.shifjk as shifjk from ${dbSchemal3}in_efi_yaohl t, ${dbSchemal3}in_efi_tongbjpd y, ${dbSchemal3}in_efi_daowldsj z where t.yaohlh = y.yaohlh and t.usercenter = y.usercenter and t.yaohlh = z.yaohlh and t.usercenter = z.usercenter

select t.t01a001 as jfdh, t.d04a001 as tch, y.b04a001 as um, z.a04a002 as lingjh, replace(to_char(b05ab02*(select count(b05ab01) from ${dbSchemal3}in_edi_fhtz_bzxx y),'99999999.99'),' ','0') as lingjsl from ${dbSchemal3}in_edi_fhtz_fyxx t, ${dbSchemal3}in_edi_fhtz_bzxx y, ${dbSchemal3}in_edi_fhtz_fymx z where t.t01a001 = y.t01a001 and t.t01a001 = z.t01a001

select fhtzh, to_char(scsj, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as scsj, to_char(fssj, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as fssj, to_char(ddsj, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as ddsj, chenys, gongys, xiehd, kach, usercenter, lingjh, lingjmc, replace(to_char(lingjsl, '999999.99'), ' ', '') as lingjsl, yaohlh, rqxh, replace(to_char(rqsl, '999999.99'), ' ', '') as rqsl, replace(to_char(rqnljsl, '999999.99'), ' ', '') as rqnljsl, '' as filler from ${dbSchemal3}in_gevp_fhtz
select substr(shengcxbh,1,3) as shengcxbh,lingjbh,xiaohdbh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjxhd where biaos='1'

select t.c_usercenter as usercenter, t.lingjbc_componenth as lingjbh, t.t_start as t_start, t.t_end as t_end, t.c_line_code as c_line_code, replace(replace(to_char(t.n_num,'999999999.999999'),'.',''),' ','0') as n_num, substr(t.c_make_line,1,3) as c_make_line from ${dbSchemal3}in_gundmxq t,${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingj y where t.c_usercenter = y.usercenter and t.lingjbc_componenth = y.lingjbh and y.biaos = '0'

select t.lingjbh as lingjbh, '' as filler, t.usercenter as usercenter, t.cangkdm as cangkdm, '-'||replace(replace(to_char((t.dingdlj - t.jiaoflj),'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as zysl, to_char(t.ziyhqrq, 'yyyyMMdd') as scsj, t.gongysdm as gongysdm, replace(replace(to_char(t.jiaoflj,'999999999999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as jiaoflj, replace(replace(to_char(t.dingdlj,'999999999999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as dingdlj, replace(replace(to_char(t.kucsl,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as kucsl, replace(replace(to_char(t.anqkcts*y.cmj,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as aqkc, replace(replace(to_char(t.xttzz,'999999999999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as xttzz,'' as gonghlx from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_ziykzb t,${dbSchemal3}ckx_cmj y where t.usercenter=y.usercenter and t.lingjbh=y.lingjbh
select usercenter,'' as shengcxbh,gcbh,gonghlx,'' as filler from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_gongys where leix='1' or leix='2'
select 'CLI' as cli,usercenter,fenpqh,shengcxbh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_fenpq

select 'A01' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, RUKLSH, UTH, BLH, to_char(BLSCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, CHANX, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, DINGDH, ELH, PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, to_char(RUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') RUKSJ, to_char(RUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, RUKLX, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal3}IN_CK_RUKMX t where t.RUKLX = '1' or t.RUKLX = '2'

select 'A03' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, RUKLSH, UTH, ' ' BLH, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, CHANX, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH||ZICKBH CKBH, to_char(RUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') RUKSJ, to_char(RUKSJ,'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, RUKLX, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal3}IN_CK_RUKMX t WHERE t.RUKLX = '3'

select 'A01S' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, RUKLSH, UTH, BLH, to_char(BLSCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, CHANX, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, DINGDH, ELH, PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH||ZICKBH CKBH, to_char(RUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') RUKSJ, to_char(RUKSJ,'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, RUKLX, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal3}IN_CK_RUKMX t WHERE t.RUKLX = '4'

select 'A08' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, ' ' UTH, ' ' BLH, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, ' ' CHANX, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, ' ' PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, ' ' RUKSJ, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal3}IN_CK_FANXD t

select 'A08S' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, ' ' UTH, ' ' BLH, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, ' ' CHANX, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, ' ' PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, ' ' RUKSJ, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal3}IN_CK_FANXD t

select 'A10' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, ' ' UTH, ' ' BLH, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJSL, DANW, ' ' CHANX, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, ' ' CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, ' ' PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, ' ' RUKSJ, to_char(SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal3}IN_CK_FANXD t

select 'A25' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, UTH, BLH, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, KUCSL LINGJSL, DANW, ' ' CHANX, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') RUKSJ, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal3}IN_CK_JIUFD t

select 'A25S' CZM, ' ' QXBS, ' ' FILLER, ' ' LCLX, '1' KBBS, 'N' XDJF, 'S' TWBB, ' ' JFM, ' ' PX, 'N ' HGBS, ' ' FILLER2, ' ' GYSLCBS, ' ' CLLBM, ' ' FILLER3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') CWRRQ, ' ' FILLER4, ' ' CJJLH, USERCENTER, UTH, BLH, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') BLSCSJ, LINGJBH, KUCSL LINGJSL, DANW, ' ' CHANX, GONGYSDM, ' ' GONGYSLX, CHENGYSMC, ' ' DINGDH, ELH, PICH, CANGKBH, CANGKBH || ZICKBH CKBH, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') RUKSJ, to_char(JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDDMIHH24') JLHRQ, CANGKGLYZ, CREATE_TIME from ${dbSchemal3}IN_CK_JIUFD t

select 'SERV' JLLX, m.usercenter FSQDM, ' ' FSQHGM, ' ' FSQDZ, '78001H 74 ' JSQDM, ' ' JSQHGM, ' ' JSQDZ, '00' FYQSD, to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddHH24MI') FYQNSJ, ' ' XXLX, ' ' XXBB, ' ' RDM, ' ' YZC, ' ' XXDM, ' ' XXJSR, 'Y' CALDELBS, ' ' JSSCLJS,
'DT0900' JLLX2, '0000001101' XXH, '34' XXLX2, to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddHH24MI') RQSJ, to_char(m.yaohqsrq,'yyyymmddHH24MI') SXRQKSRQ, to_char(m.Yaohjsrq,'yyyymmddHH24MI') SXRQJSRQ, ' ' XXGNDM,
'DC1800' JLLX3, m.Gongysdm XSSDM, '5 ' XSSDMFZDLC, '78001H ' XSSNBZM,
'DC0100' JLLX4, '0060653931709' GMSDM, '5 ' GMSDMFZDLC,
'DC0500' JLLX4, '006065393170900000' JSRDM, '5 ' JSRDMFZDLC,
'DA0900' JLLX5, m.lingjbh GMSLJH, m.dingdh DDH, '3' WHMXD, ' ' JFQXRQ,
'DA0100' JLLX6, ' ' XSSGYSLJH, ' ' XGMSLJMS,
'DG0605' JLLX7, to_char(m.yaohqsrq,'yyyymmddHH24MI') JFKSRQ, to_char(m.Yaohjsrq,'yyyymmddHH24MI') JFJSRQ, m.shul JFSL, m.danw JFSLDW, '113' JFYYDM,
'DH0200' JLLX8, m.dinghcj XHD
from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_DINGDMX m join ${dbSchemal1}Xqjs_Dingd d on d.dingdh = m.dingdh and d.dingdzt = '4' and d.shifyjsyhl='2'

SELECT lpad(rownum, 6, '0') JLLX, '000000' SCHMD, y.usercenter FSQDM, ' ' FSQHGM, ' ' FSQDZ, '78001H74' JSQDM, ' ' JSQHGM, ' ' JSQDZ, '00' FYSCSJ, '000000' FYNYR, '0000' FYSJ, ' ' XXLX, ' ' XXBB, ' ' FBXX, ' ' YZDLC, ' ' LHXXDM, ' ' XXJSR, 'Y' CALDELBS,

'006065393170900000' LJJSRDM, '10' JSRDMFZDLC,
'000254206547900272' SYRDM, '5' FYRDMFZDLC,
Y.GONGYSDM XSSDM, '5' XSSFZDLC, '78001H' SXSZM,
'3' SCSX,
Y.UCRL UCLJSL, Y.DANW UCLJSLDW, Y.UCGS YZBZSL,
